QuestData.Title: Arcane Sanctum: Ko'ragh
QuestData.Description: Ye know the name "Ko'ragh?" One of them Highmaul ogres. They dug up a relic some time ago that killed everyone it touched but for Ko'ragh... givin' him a near-complete immunity to all magic.$b$bOgres ain't meant to have that kind of power! Travel to Highmaul and defeat Ko'ragh, before they learn to use him against us.
